Description: Ragged rectangle textile fragment of undyed linen cloth, of medium - fine quality; some oily stains. Textile has rotted, especially in the areas of the stains. Edges are torn. Cloth appears to have been flattened or polished. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.28 ends per 10mm and weft c.14 picks per 10mm.
